+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------+
| <kbd>keyboard</kbd>                               | Action                                      |
+===================================================+=============================================+
| <kbd>tab</kbd>                                    | Autocomplete                                |
+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------+
| <kbd>↑</kbd> / <kbd>↓</kbd>                       | Navigate command history backwards/forwards |
+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------+
| <kbd>ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>c</kbd>                    | Kill process                                |
+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------+
| <kbd>ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>d</kbd>                    | End terminal or ssh session (or use `exit`) |
+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------+
| <kbd>ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>r</kbd>                    | Search command history                      |
+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------+
| <kbd>ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>a</kbd>                    | Move to beginning of line                   |
+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------+
| <kbd>ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>e</kbd>                    | Move to end of line                         |
+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------+
| <kbd>alt</kbd> + <kbd>b</kbd>                     | Move back one word                          |
+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------+
| <kbd>alt</kbd> + <kbd>f</kbd>                     | Move forward one word                       |
+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------+
| <kbd>ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>u</kbd>                    | Cut/kill text before cursor                 |
+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------+
| <kbd>ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>k</kbd>                    | Cut/kill text after cursor:                 |
+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------+
| <kbd>ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>y</kbd>                    | Paste/yank (previously cut) text            |
+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------+
| <kbd>ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>shift</kbd> + <kbd>-</kbd> | Undo typing                                 |
+---------------------------------------------------+---------------------------------------------+

: Terminal keyboard shortcuts
